alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Ellis; Harmon; Harper; Roger Mills; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 29 at 12:38PM CDT until March 30 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Harper, Ellis, Woodward, Roger Mills, Beckham and Harmon Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 8 PM CDT this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from 6 AM to 6 PM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Ellis; Harmon; Harper; Roger Mills; Woodward
